title: Easy Ways to Find Old Playlists on Spotify

steps.title: Go to https://www.spotify.com/us/account/overview/#_=_.
steps.content: Go to https://www.spotify.com/us/account/overview/#_=_ . You can use any web browser to recover your old playlists on Spotify.

steps.title: Log in (if prompted).
steps.content: Log in (if prompted). Make sure you are using the login information for the Spotify account you want to access.

steps.title: Click Recover playlists.
steps.content: Click Recover playlists . You'll see this in the vertical menu on the left side of the browser.

steps.title: Click Restore next to the playlist you want to recover.
steps.content: Click Restore next to the playlist you want to recover. It will appear in your playlists section of Spotify. [1] X Research source
